snippet: Ivan Cheparinov, who was ranked as No. 17 in the tournament field, won a playoff to take the crown at the Tradewise Gibraltar Chess Festival.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column examines Ivan Cheparinov's win at three-way playoff to take the title at the 12th Tradewise Gibraltar Chess Festival.
lead_paragraph: Ivan Cheparinov, who was ranked as No. 17 in the tournament field, won a playoff to take the crown at the Tradewise Gibraltar Chess Festival.

headline.main: After Unexpected Climb Into Playoff, Bulgarian Is King of the Rock
headline.print_headline: After Unexpected Climb Into Playoff, Bulgarian Is King of the Rock
